page.title: 12A TYPICAL WEEKEND IN 1985
page.content: { Saturday:}Daniel gets up later today and sits watching his favourite {T.V. cartoons}whilst eating his breakfast, as do most of his classmates. Then he slides out of the house before his Mum can call him back to do a job. He likes making a camp down by a local stream. Other children play on their{BMX bikes}or go shopping to{Sainsbury's or Tesco's.}If it is wet John likes playing with his Space Lego. Others go swimming to{Eastbourne {Leisure Pool. { Sunday:}Hannah, Juliet and Simon go to{church}as do about half of their friends. Simon then likes to rush off to play Rugby. Janine likes to play Swing-ball and Abigail may go riding. Others like to take a picnic lunch and {go out in the car}with their family. Harry likes to do chemical experiments and listen to the latest{pop records.
